headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Old Dominion Freight Line (ODFL) After The Recent Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Old Dominion Freight Line at around US$202 a share is priced fairly or not, you are in the right place for a closer look at what that tag might really mean. The stock has seen some sharp moves recently, with returns of 17.1% over the last 7 days, 19.7% over the last 30 days, 27.0% year to date, and 3.9% over the last year, compared with 15.8% over 3 years and 99.0% over 5 years. These shifts have put Old Dominion Freight Line back on many watchlists, as investors...

headline: What Does Old Dominion (ODFL) Boosting Its Dividend Amid Weaker Results Reveal About Management’s Priorities?
summary: In early February 2026, Old Dominion Freight Line reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results showing lower revenue and earnings year on year, while its board approved a first-quarter 2026 cash dividend of US$0.29 per share, a 3.6% increase from the first quarter of 2025. An interesting aspect is that Old Dominion raised its dividend despite softer freight volumes and weaker profits, underscoring management’s focus on consistent shareholder returns alongside ongoing investments in...
